name: A Zombie Experience (The Warehouse)
description:
Make correct choices to survive. Zombies are dangerous... It's a zombie game, don't get got! 

There is still a decent amount of work to do, but it works as a Time Cave, and then a Branch and Bottleneck Story, and then into sort of a Loop and Grow for one of the last Parts 3. There are still a more endings to get to, so yeah!
